prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature of Stefan's thoughts and feelings towards me right now?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the compilation of every element in the provided horary chart that will be used for analysis under horary principles. I have organized the data into categories:

1. Ascendant and House Representations
 • Ascendant (represents you, Melissa Gale): 21° Gemini
 • Stefan is represented by the 9th House (foreign connection). In the chart, the 9th House begins at 4° Aquarius and contains key planets associated with him.

2. Planetary Positions and House Placements
 • Sun: 15° Aquarius – located in the 9th House
 • Mercury: 11° Aquarius – located in the 9th House
 • Moon: 24° Aries – located in the 11th House
 • Venus: 29° Pisces – located in the 11th House
 • Mars: 19°41′ Cancer (retrograde) – located in the 2nd House (per provided house details)
 • Jupiter: 11°16′ Gemini (retrograde) – located in the 12th House
 • Saturn: 17°43′ Pisces – located in the 10th House
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus – located in the 12th House
 • Neptune: 28°2′ Pisces – located in the 11th House
 • Pluto: 2°8′ Aquarius – located in the 8th House
 • North Node: 29°42′ Pisces (retrograde) – located in the 11th House
 • Chiron: 19°35′ Aries – located in the 11th House
 • MC (Midheaven): 25°15′ Aquarius
 • IC (Imum Coeli): 25°15′ Leo

3. Major Aspects (with orbs as provided)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 0°)
 • Moon sextile MC (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 1°)
 • Moon trine IC (orb: 1°)
 • Chiron sextile Ascendant (orb: 2°)
 • Uranus square IC (orb: 2°)
 • Uranus square MC (orb: 2°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Ascendant sextile IC (orb: 4°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Saturn square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant trine MC (orb: 4°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Moon square Mars (orb: 5°)
 • Moon conjunct Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Venus sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Chiron trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Sun trine Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Neptune square Ascendant (orb: 7°)

4. Patterns Identified in the Chart
 • T-Square Pattern:
  – Involving MC at 25° Aquarius, Uranus at 23° Taurus, and IC at 25° Leo.
 • Cradle Pattern:
  – Formed by MC at 25° Aquarius, IC at 25° Leo, Ascendant at 21° Gemini, Chiron at 19° Aries, and Moon at 24° Aries.

5. Additional Special Features
 • Moon Phase: Waxing crescent
 • Overall chart shape: Bowl
 • Dominance: Inner planets are mostly in Air signs, with none falling in Earth signs
 • Quadrant Distribution: The bottom right quadrant is empty; many planets reside in the top left quadrant
 • Frequency: Sextile aspect occurs 12 times and both the Moon and Ascendant are involved in 10 aspects
 • Jupiter is rising; the IC aligns with the Nadir

This comprehensive list covers every relevant datum—from house representations to planetary placements, aspects, and special patterns—that will serve as the foundation for a full horary interpretation regarding Stefan's thoughts and feelings toward you. Verify these details, and once confirmed, I will proceed with the interpretive analysis.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the interpretive synthesis, following traditional horary principles, based solely on the chart data provided:

1. Representation and Communication
 • With your Ascendant in Gemini for you and Stefan’s representative key—his 9th house beginning at 4° Aquarius—there is an emphasis on intellectual and conceptual engagement.
 • The Sun (15° Aquarius) and Mercury (11° Aquarius) positioned in the 9th house speak to Stefan’s mindset: his thoughts are dominated by ideals, principles, and an unconventional approach. Communication in his internal dialogue is clear, analytical, and driven by a need for mental liberation.

2. Emotional Underpinnings and Idealization
 • Venus in Pisces (29° Pisces), found in the 11th house, is in strong conjunction with Neptune (28° Pisces) and the North Node (29° Pisces). This confluence indicates that Stefan might be projecting idealized feelings toward you. There is a tendency here to see you in an almost mythic or inspirational light—one tinted with longing and a desire for transcendence over mundane concerns.
 • The Venus–Neptune connection may also cloak his genuine sentiments in a veil of romantic illusion or uncertainty, complicating the clarity of his emotional expression.

3. Wounding and Responsive Impulses
 • The presence of Mars in Cancer (19°41′, retrograde) making an exact square with Chiron in Aries (19°35′) hints at underlying wounding or past hurt that colors his drive. This aspect may manifest as a frustration or guardedness that creates a subtle tension between his fiery impulses (Chiron/Moon dynamics, with the Moon in Aries at 24°) and his need for emotional security.
 • The mutual reception hinted by the Moon in Aries and Mars in Cancer suggests that despite this tension, there is a dynamic, albeit conflicted, drive in his emotional and instinctive responses. His feelings are charged with a protective urgency that can fluctuate between cautious distance and impulsive engagement.

4. Patterns Indicating Outer Influences
 • The T-square involving the Midheaven (25° Aquarius), Uranus (23° Taurus), and the Imum Coeli (25° Leo) creates an environment of sudden shifts and unexpected impulses. This pattern reinforces that Stefan’s inner state may be subject to external shocks or abrupt realizations that alter how he processes his attraction and thoughts about you.
 • The Cradle pattern, with key energies flowing between the Midheaven, Imum Coeli, Ascendant, Chiron, and Moon, underscores that his connection to you is enveloped in a blend of destiny and healing. His perspective is layered, combining idealism with the raw need to resolve internal imbalances.

5. Overall Synthesis
 • Stefan’s true thoughts seem to be firmly rooted in cognitive and conceptual evaluation. His 9th house placement, along with the twin influences of the Sun and Mercury, point to a sincere but measured interest—where his mind is actively reworking long-held beliefs and ideals in the light of your presence.
 • Emotionally, the heavy Pisces influence through Venus, Neptune, and the North Node suggests that he is simultaneously drawn by a romantic, almost fated allure. However, the overlay of Mars square Chiron brings the reality of vulnerability and unresolved internal wounds to the forefront, causing his feelings to be imbued with an undercurrent of sensitivity and a guardedness against potential hurt.
 • The interplay of these elements indicates that while Stefan is indeed attracted and intrigued by you, his feelings carry the weight of idealization mixed with self-protective caution. There isn’t an overt effusion of passionate longing; rather, there is a multidimensional process at work—a blending of intellectual admiration with an inner yearning for healing and emotional security.

Based on the above clear, data-driven analysis, Stefan’s thoughts and feelings toward you are characterized by an intellectual and idealistic interest, filtered through a personal need to resolve emotional wounds. His approach is not impulsively passionate but layered, guided by a rational, unconventional mindset that is also vulnerable to sudden, transformative impulses.
